# `create_spatialGrid_default_2D`

create_spatialGrid_default_2D


## Description

create a 2D spatial grid


## Usage

```r
create_spatialGrid_default_2D(
  gobject,
  spat_unit = NULL,
  spat_loc_name = "raw",
  sdimx_stepsize = NULL,
  sdimy_stepsize = NULL,
  minimum_padding = 1
)
```
